title: [Neuroscience] Keeping the brain active in old age has always been a smart idea, but a new study suggests that reading, writing letters and playing card games or puzzles in later life may delay onset of Alzheimerâ€™s dementia by up to five years. It may be beneficial to start doing these things even in the 80s.

[Health] Researchers find the best time to consume proteins for building and strengthening muscles is during breakfast. Furthermore, researchers also found a strong association between skeletal muscle index and the proportion of protein intake at breakfast relative to total protein intake through the day.
